thread.title: Standard completes the acquisition of the Valmy Property - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Silver Standard completes the acquisition of the Valmy Property - Yahoo Finance

author: Silver Standard Resources Inc.
title: Standard completes the acquisition of the Valmy Property - Yahoo Finance
text:
VANCOUVER, Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -   Inc. ( SSRI ) ( SSO.TO ) ("Silver Standard") announces that it has completed the acquisition of the Valmy Property, contiguous with our Marigold mine in Nevada, U.S. for $11.5 million in cash from Newmont Mining Corporation ( NEM ). This transaction was previously announced in our press release dated August 11, 2015.
To receive Silver Standard's news releases by e-mail, please register using the Silver Standard website at www.silverstandard.com .
For further information contact:
W. John DeCooman, Jr.
Vice President, Business Development and Strategy
  Inc.
Vancouver, BC
